docs.snippet: Brazil will deploy federal troops to Rio de Janeiro to help quell a surge in violent crime following attacks by drug traffickers on police posts in three slums on the north side of the city, government officials said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil will deploy federal troops to Rio de Janeiro to help quell a surge in violent crime following attacks by drug traffickers on police posts in three slums on the north side of the city, government officials said on Friday.

headline.main: Federal Troops to Help Rio Battle Gang Violence in Slums
headline.print_headline: Federal Troops to Help Rio Battle Gang Violence in Slums

docs.snippet: In the one-man show “Satchmo at the Waldorf,” John Douglas Thompson vividly resurrects Louis Armstrong as he reminisces about a life that spanned a vast cultural divide....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the one-man show “Satchmo at the Waldorf,” John Douglas Thompson vividly resurrects Louis Armstrong as he reminisces about a life that spanned a vast cultural divide.
docs.abstract: Andy Webster reviews Terry Teachout one-man production Satchmo at the Waldorf, directed by Gordon Edelstein and starring John Douglas Thompson at Westside Theater.

headline.seo: Louis Armstrong Reminisces in ‘Satchmo at the Waldorf’
headline.main: A Singular Trumpeter Unreels His Life
headline.print_headline: A Singular Trumpeter Unreels His Life

docs.snippet: The company conducted an inquiry by reading through email and instant messages, which may violate its promise of privacy, highlighting the power technology companies have to snoop on their customers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company conducted an inquiry by reading through email and instant messages, which may violate its promise of privacy, highlighting the power technology companies have to snoop on their customers.
docs.abstract: Microsoft's suit accusing a former employee of stealing company secrets reveals power that it and other major technology companies have to snoop on their customers' private data; company read the emails and instant messages of a blogger who was in contact with the employee in order to gather evidence, actions that were fully legal; Microsoft has pledged to take steps toward transparency.

headline.main: Microsoft Software Leak Inquiry Raises Privacy Issues
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Software Leak Inquiry Raises Privacy Issues

byline.contributor: Nick Wingfield reported from Seattle and Nick Bilton from San Francisco.
byline.original: By NICK WINGFIELD and NICK BILTON

docs.snippet: The architects designing the new Sandy Hook elementary school have had to contend with the extra burden of the horrific crime that unfolded on Dec. 14, 2012, and they turned to the residents of Newtown, Conn., for feedback....
docs.lead_paragraph: The architects designing the new Sandy Hook elementary school have had to contend with the extra burden of the horrific crime that unfolded on Dec. 14, 2012, and they turned to the residents of Newtown, Conn., for feedback.
docs.abstract: Svigals + Partners, architectural firm designing new Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, winnowed its options for a final plan by gently coaxing feedback from people of the town; firm's approach has been appreciated by Newtown residents, who are still grappling with raw emotions.

headline.main: Newtown Helps Map Out a New Path to Healing
headline.print_headline: Newtown Helps Map Out a New Path to Healing

docs.snippet: Kaveh Golestan’s photographs of prostitutes in Tehran’s red-light district before the 1979 revolution are on view in Amsterdam through May 4....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kaveh Golestan’s photographs of prostitutes in Tehran’s red-light district before the 1979 revolution are on view in Amsterdam through May 4.
docs.abstract: Exhibit Kaveh Golestan: The Citadel, at Foam Photography Museum in Amsterdam, showcases photographs taken by journalist Golestan of prostitutes in Tehran's red-light district before 1979 revolution.

headline.main: Rare Glimpses of Iran’s Lost Underworld
headline.print_headline: Glimpses Behind the Walls of a Long-Gone Iranian Ghetto
